import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

public class Homework2_task5 {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException 
			  
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	    ChromeDriver driverChrome = new ChromeDriver();
		driverChrome.get("http://www.emag.ro/");
		driverChrome.manage().window().maximize();	

		//time delay to input captcha
				Thread.sleep(10000);

		driverChrome.findElement(By.id("my_account")).click();		
    	driverChrome.findElement(By.tagName("input")).sendKeys("olya.gubenco@gmail.com");
    	driverChrome.findElement(By.id("user_login_continue")).click();
    	//time delay to input captcha
    	Thread.sleep(15000);
    	driverChrome.findElement(By.id("user_register_full_name")).sendKeys("Olga Gubenco");
    	driverChrome.findElement(By.name("user_register[password][first]")).sendKeys("ololololo");
    	driverChrome.findElement(By.tagName("button")).click();
	}

}
